description:
In the world of mountains and seas, there exists a class of creatures called "foreign beasts". The beasts can evolve into demons by cultivating and gaining spiritual knowledge. However, due to the turmoil in history, humans and demons have always been in a state of hostility. Mo Bai, as the eldest disciple of the immortal cultivation sect Tian Ji Sect, is gifted but does not cultivate immortality properly, and only wants to eat all the food in the world. In this journey, he inadvertently discovers the secret of the human-demon turmoil in the past. ......
source: bgm.tv/DeepL
